data.content:
noun
plural -tions
[count] :the act of formally choosing someone as a candidate for a job, position, office, etc.
We expect him to get the Democratic nomination.
the act of choosing someone for a job, position, office, etc. [count]
The Senate has to approve his nomination. [=choice] [noncount]
Membership is by nomination only.
[count] the act of choosing someone or something as a candidate for receiving an honor or award
The novel earned a nomination for the National Book Award.
The film received five Academy Award nominations.
someone or something that has been chosen as a candidate for receiving an honor or award
The nominations for the Academy Awards have been announced.

Danh từ
sự chỉ định, sự bổ nhiệm, sự được chỉ định, sự được bổ nhiệm
trường hợp chỉ định, trường hợp bổ nhiệm
how many nominations have there been?
Đã có mấy trường hợp được bổ nhiệm thế?
